featured.text: Out of and consideration, I always write a thank-you note when someone sends me a gift.

other.text: I’d like to thank you for your hospitality our group.

definition.zh_def: 感謝，表示對某人或某事的感激之情。
definition.en_def: To express gratitude or appreciation to someone for something.
definition.example: I want to thank you for your help.
